1 namespace Fasetto.Word
2 {
3  using System.Windows;
4  using System.Windows.Controls;
5 
6  /// <inheritdoc/>
7  /// <summary>
8  /// The HasText attached property for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.PasswordBox"/>
9  /// </summary>
10  public class HasTextProperty : BaseAttachedProperty<HasTextProperty, bool>
11  {
12  #region Public Methods
13 
14  /// <summary>
15  /// Set the HasText property based on if the caller <see cref="PasswordBox"/> has any text
16  /// </summary>
17  /// <param name="sender">The passsword box that we are monitoring</param>
18  public static void SetValue(DependencyObject sender)
19  {
20  SetValue(sender, ((PasswordBox)sender).SecurePassword.Length > 0);
21  }
22 
23  #endregion Public Methods
24  }
25 
26  /// <inheritdoc/>
27  /// <summary>
28  /// The MonitorPassword attached property for a <see cref="PasswordBox"/>
29  /// </summary>
30  public class MonitorPasswordProperty : BaseAttachedProperty<MonitorPasswordProperty, bool>
31  {
32  #region Private Methods
33 
34  /// <summary>
35  /// Fire when the <see cref="PasswordBox"/> value changes
36  /// </summary>
37  /// <param name="sender">The attached <see cref="PasswordBox"/></param>
38  /// <param name="e">The event arguments</param>
39  private void PasswordBox_PasswordChanged(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
40  {
41  // Set the attached HasText value
42  HasTextProperty.SetValue((PasswordBox)sender);
43  }
44 
45  #endregion Private Methods
46 
47  /// <summary>
48  /// Override the OnValueChanged base function to check if the <see cref="PasswordBox"/> text
49  /// has changed
50  /// </summary>
51  /// <param name="sender">The PasswordBox to check</param>
52  /// <param name="e">The event arguments</param>
53  public override void OnValueChanged(DependencyObject sender, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)
54  {
55  // Get the caller
56  var passwordBox = (PasswordBox)sender;
57 
58  // Make sure we are using a PasswordBox
59  if (passwordBox == null)
60  {
61  return;
62  }
63 
64  // Remove any previous events
65  passwordBox.PasswordChanged -= PasswordBox_PasswordChanged;
66 
67  // If the caller set MonitorPassword to true, start listening for an event
68  if ((bool)e.NewValue)
69  {
70  // Set default value
71  HasTextProperty.SetValue(passwordBox);
72 
73  // Start listening for password changes
74  passwordBox.PasswordChanged += PasswordBox_PasswordChanged;
75  }
76  }
77  }
78 }
